qas.question: What kind of wood was Bell's coffin made from?
What color silk was used in Bell's coffin?
What color were attendees asked to not wear at Bell's funeral?
Which singer performed at Bell's funeral?

context: Bell's coffin was constructed of <a0_0>Beinn Bhreagh pine<a0_0/> by his laboratory staff, lined with the same <a1_0>red<a1_0/> silk fabric used in his tetrahedral kite experiments. To help celebrate his life, his wife asked guests not to wear <a2_0>black<a2_0/> (the traditional funeral color) while attending his service, during which soloist <a3_0>Jean MacDonald<a3_0/> sang a verse of Robert Louis Stevenson's "Requiem":
